station_dataframe

postprocessinglib.evaluation.metrics.station_dataframe(observed: DataFrame, simulated: DataFrame, station_num: int) → DataFrame

Extracts a stations data from the observed and simulated

Parameters:

  • observed (pd.DataFrame) – Observed values[1: Day of the year; 2: Streamflow Values]

  • simulated (pd.DataFrame) – Simulated values[1: Day of the year; 2: Streamflow Values]

  • station_num (List[int]) – array containing the index of the particular stations(s)

Returns:

The station(s) observed and simulated data

Return type:

pd.DataFrames

JUPYTER NOTEBOOK TUTORIAL

Example

Retrieve the various individual stations data

 1import numpy as np
 2import pandas as pd
 3from postprocessinglib.evaluation import metrics
 4
 5# Create your index as an array
 6index = np.array([1981, 1982, 1983, 1984, 1985, 1986, 1987, 1988, 1989, 1990])
 7
 8# Create a test dataframe
 9test_df = pd.DataFrame(data = np.random.rand(10, 4), columns = ("obs1", "sim1", "obs2", "sim2"), index = index)
10print(test_df)
11          obs1      sim1      obs2      sim2
121981  0.405658  0.656620  0.463430  0.570444
131982  0.166756  0.567266  0.018316  0.165674
141983  0.831708  0.396591  0.522035  0.606923
151984  0.896720  0.864245  0.692322  0.786928
161985  0.631849  0.326800  0.334343  0.976953
171986  0.236162  0.967424  0.264937  0.333279
181987  0.547575  0.939817  0.329754  0.000407
191988  0.195756  0.636409  0.278995  0.967959
201989  0.006018  0.355942  0.158092  0.427026
211990  0.543909  0.067026  0.493195  0.925726
22
23# Generate the observed and simulated Dataframes
24obs = test_df.iloc[:, [0, 2]]
25sim = test_df.iloc[:, [1, 3]]
26
27# Extract the stations
28stations = metrics.station_dataframe(observed = obs, simulated = sim, 1)
29print(stations[0])
30              obs1      sim1
31    1981  0.405658  0.656620
32    1982  0.166756  0.567266
33    1983  0.831708  0.396591
34    1984  0.896720  0.864245
35    1985  0.631849  0.326800
36    1986  0.236162  0.967424
37    1987  0.547575  0.939817
38    1988  0.195756  0.636409
39    1989  0.006018  0.355942
40    1990  0.543909  0.067026
